data.author: carlosperate

changelog.release_notes:
The main update is the ability to automatically register a username on the Hue Bridge (before it had to be done manually):

- On app installation the configuration page will be opened on the phone (and a message to edit the configuration displayed on the Pebble).
- The configuration page now has a "Register QuickHue" button.
- Pressing the button registers the a new user in the Hue Bridge for the QuickHue application, or if there is a username already inputted in the "Hue Bridge User" form text field it tries to register that user.

First mvp release of the QuickHue for Pebble app. This version is capable of:

* Toggling light state on launch (ideal for button Quick Launch
* Toggle light pressing the middle button.
* Increase and decrease brightness using the top and bottom buttons.
* Set up Philips Hue configuration data on the mobile app config page.

data.description:
Pebble app to facilitate quick control of a Philips Hue light bulb.

It will toggle the preselected light ON or OFF as soon as the app loads, so it is designed to be registered as a button shortcut for quick light control. When the app is already open the Up and down will also change the brightness of the light.

Automatic pairing with the bridge has been added.

Any questions or bugs can be reported in the "source link" below.

latest_release.release_notes:
The main update is the ability to automatically register a username on the Hue Bridge (before it had to be done manually):

- On app installation the configuration page will be opened on the phone (and a message to edit the configuration displayed on the Pebble).
- The configuration page now has a "Register QuickHue" button.
- Pressing the button registers the a new user in the Hue Bridge for the QuickHue application, or if there is a username already inputted in the "Hue Bridge User" form text field it tries to register that user.

data.title: QuickHue
